title: LC2 Style Petit - 2 Seat Sofa Black
body: The Mobelaris style of LC2 Style Petit Confort 2 Sofa is one of the first modern furniture ranges to take a radical step in making the furniture frame dramatic and visible aspect of the design in 1929 for the Salon d Automne art exhibition in Paris. This inside out chair is composed of a simple tubular frame and leather-covered cushions, a modernist response to the traditional chair that still manage to stay strong even after more than nine decades. The LC2 Style Petit Confort 2 Sofa is a spacious love seat which creates an impressive style statement in any environment.
